title: Swollen battery - Pixel 4XL
content:
In June, I returned my faulty Pixel 4XL and was provided with a factory refurbished model as replacement, under warranty. 

The replacement now has a swollen battery and the back case is bulging as a result. I am concerned that this is a safety risk, and also that the phone keeps shutting down without warning and the battery draining. 

How do i rectify this ASAP?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
